content.title: WISE Post-Doctoral Fellowship
content.details: The Department of Science and Technology (DST) is implementing a dedicated umbrella scheme 'Women in Science and Engineering-KIRAN (WISE-KIRAN)' with the aim to support women from all walks of life in the domain of Science & Technology. The Department has re-structured one of the flagship programme 'Women Scientists Scheme' and come up with a new programme 'WISE Post-Doctoral Fellowship (WISE-PDF)' that aims to provide opportunities to women scientists and technologists between the age group of 27-60 years who want to continue the research as bench-level scientists in basic and applied sciences.
benefits: The fellowship amount under this programme is @₹55,000/- per month with House Rent Allowances as per DST norms.
This Programme also provides a Research Grant of ₹2.0 Lakhs per year and the cost of small equipment (up to a maximum of ₹3.0 Lakhs) along with Institutional overhead charges.
eligibility: Candidates in regular employment are not eligible for WISE-PDF. However, women scientists who are temporarily employed in research or academics may apply for the scheme but they have to leave their earlier assignment if the WISE-PDF project is approved.
The minimum age to apply is 27 years and the maximum is 60 years. Women scientists, less than 27 years of age are NOT eligible.
Women Scientists having a Ph.D. in Basic/ Applied Science or an equivalent degree like MD, MS, MDS, etc. are eligible for WISE-PDF.
Break in career is not mandatory to apply for WISE-PDF, however, women who have a break are also encouraged to apply for this programme.
content.application_process: Online. Proposals should be submitted at the DST-WISE portal. The portal is open throughout the year.
documents_required: Proof of age (Birth Certificate, 10th Class certificate)

faqs.question: Is WOS-A programme is still open for proposal submission?
faqs.answer: No. WOS-A programme is now re-structured and re-designed into 2 separate programmes for Ph.D. and non-Ph.D. women candidates viz. WISE Post-Doctoral Fellowship (WISE-PDF) and WISE Fellowship for Ph.D. (WISE-PhD).

faqs.question: What is the minimum qualification for applying under WISE-PDF?
What is the age limit for WISE-PDF?
Is employed Women Scientists are eligible to apply in WISE-PDF programme?
faqs.answer: Women Scientists other than permanent/regular positions are eligible for WOS-A including unemployed.

faqs.question: What are the subject areas where support is available under WISE-PDF programme?
faqs.answer: WISE-PDF programme supports projects in 5 subject areas of basic and applied sciences namely; Physical and Mathematical Sciences (PM), Chemical Sciences (CS), Life Sciences (LS), Earth & Atmospheric Sciences (EA) and Engineering & Technology (ET).
